Title: Lucy2D
Description: Projet for developing 2D Games based on WPF and XNA. The point is to minimize effort for developers and fast prototyping.
HomeWiki:
Lucy2D - a 2D Game Creator Tool

 

There are a lot of 2D Game creation tools around. Each of them has it's great advantages and also disadvantages.

I am trying to take all the advantages into a great tool - currently called Lucy2D.
